h2_title: Yellow Wind Ridge Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: This Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found after clearing out the small village you will find yourself in after defeating the Tiger Vanguard at the Crouching Tiger Temple. It's just to the right of the exit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Windrest Bridge Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
This Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found after clearing out the small village you will find yourself in after defeating the Tiger Vanguard at the Crouching Tiger Temple. It's just to the right of the exit.
